医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
阿片类药物的麻醉减少心脏手术中与阿片类药物的不良事件宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。越来越多的证据表明，阿片类药物的麻醉（OSA）降低了与阿片类药物相关的不良事件。本文探讨了OSA是否可以改善心脏手术后的初始恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/opioid-sparing-anesthisia-reduces-reduces--opioid-rec-------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/opioid-sparing-anesthisia-reduces-reduces-opioid-real- cor--forderated-realderated-fordverse-forversevents-in-cardiac-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3fb5ac-9447-4143-bf47-785bcf9bbb4f5 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:44:00 -0500 Opioid-sparing anesthesia reduces opioid-related adverse events in cardiac surgery
高GATA6表达预测胰腺癌的预后改善这篇新的评论文章强调了胰腺导管腺癌（PDA）中GATA6（转录因子）的关键作用。该文章探讨了GATA6在癌症进展中的双重作用及其作为生物标志物和治疗靶标的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/high-gata6-express-predicts-predicts-mimpredcomes-inccomes-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/high-gata6-express-predicts-predicts-mimpredcomes-incomes-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=172AF27D-370C-4574-900F-E248DF89841D Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:25:00 -0500 High GATA6 expression predicts improved outcomes in pancreatic cancer
研究揭开了UPS在癌症发展和治疗中的复杂相互作用在基因与疾病中发表的一项新综述探讨了泛素 - 蛋白酶体系统（UPS）在调节肿瘤微环境（TME）和推动癌症进展方面的关键作用。该研究提供了有关泛素化和去泛素化如何影响肿瘤细胞，免疫反应以及潜在的癌症治疗治疗策略的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/Study-unravels-the-complex-interplay-of-the-UPS-in-cancer-development-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-unravels-the-complex-inplayplay-of-the-p---------in--in-in-cancer-incancer-development-and-woreatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8846766b-b8fd-4A0C-96F5-7D7CD426BB86 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:10:00 -0500 Study unravels the complex interplay of the UPS in cancer development and treatment
了解儿童高血压的健康风险高血压（BP）不仅是一个成人问题 - 这是一种终生的疾病，可以从童年开始，但在年轻的人群中很少受到关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-the-health-risks-of-childhood-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-the-health-risks-of-childhood-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1df014c6-5EA0-4842-8351-B5C9C8C9BBE0B Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:02:51 -0500 Understanding the health risks of childhood hypertension
揭示FAM20C在疾病和癌症治疗中的作用在基因与疾病中发表的一项新评论探讨了高尔基蛋白激酶FAM20C在疾病进展中的多方面作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/unveiling-the-role-fam-fam20c-fam20c-in-disease-andease-and-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/unveiling-the-role-fam-fam20c-fam20c-in-disease-andease-and-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32909422-B322-4CD0-AC4E-2155DE267B3E Sun, 23 Feb 2025 23:26:00 -0500 Unveiling the role of FAM20C in disease and cancer treatment
探索胆汁淤积与抑郁症之间的联系宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。胆固性肝病患者的抑郁样行为的患病率明显更高，从而显着降低了生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/exploring-the-link-between-cholestasis-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/20250223/exploring-the-link-betweew-cholestasis-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6be7f44c-d854-4bf4-9224-1de3029bc20e Sun, 23 Feb 2025 23:12:46 -0500 Exploring the link between cholestasis and depression
毒液无处不在：研究检查隐藏的毒素递送系统跨越生命形式忘记蛇和蜘蛛 - 一项新的评论详细介绍了有毒植物，真菌甚至细菌，证明自然最致命的秘密武器比我们想象的要广泛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/venom-is-everywhere-study-scamines-hidded-toxin-delivery-systemss-across-life-life-life-forms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/venom-is-everywhere-study-sendy-examines-hidden-toxin-delivery-systemss-across-life-life-life-forms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60B2D3B2-0A4D-4C48-8E76-4BB521D783BF Sun, 23 Feb 2025 23:09:00 -0500 Venom is everywhere: Study examines hidden toxin delivery systems across life forms
未来食品油的选择可以决定全球森林的命运研究人员表明，满足2050年的植物油需求可能会促进1.48亿公顷的森林砍伐和1525吨CO2排放，从而质疑棕榈油替代品的可持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/future-future-food-oil-choices-could-determine-the-fate-the-fate-of-global-forests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/future-future-future-food-oil-choices-could-determine-the-fate-the-fate-fate-forests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09254CAC-017E-4AAD-4AAD-A8A0-60EF67C36B12 Sun, 23 Feb 2025 22:23:00 -0500 Future food oil choices could determine the fate of global forests
研究发现，大多数植物性餐厅的餐食都是不健康的许多素食主义者和素食餐厅的餐点都包含不健康的食材，例如精制谷物，饱和脂肪和炸食品，而Omni餐厅提供的健康选择少于蔬菜餐馆。研究人员敦促提高营养透明度，以帮助消费者做出明智的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/Most-plant-based-restaurant-meals-are-unhealthy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/Most-plant-based-restaurant-meals-are-unhealthy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26717710-fead-496f-496f-aae5-6c71f94ba84e Sun, 23 Feb 2025 21:38:00 -0500 Most plant-based restaurant meals are unhealthy, study finds
微绿色外观成熟蔬菜：研究发现较高的抗氧化剂和生物活性化合物研究人员分析了六个微生物，揭示了它们的营养谱，高抗氧化剂含量以及对抗微量营养素缺陷的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/microgreens-undshine-mature-mature-vegetables-sendy-pudy-finds-higher-antioxidants-andioxidants-and-bioacioactive-compounds.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/microgreens-undshine-mathine-mature-wegetables-study-finds-higher-antioxidants-andioxidants-and-bioactive and-bioactive-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3d421d5-7dad-43Ae-43Ae-81BB-7565cc7695ec Sun, 23 Feb 2025 21:19:00 -0500 Microgreens outshine mature vegetables: Study finds higher antioxidants and bioactive compounds
